title: Facial balance and fillers
summary: Fillers are about harmony and proportion, not changing who you are.
body: Providers often assess the face as a whole. Subtle volume can restore balance without looking overdone.

title: What to expect at a filler consult
summary: A thoughtful consult includes a full-face assessment and conservative plan.
body: You should hear what is realistic, what is optional, and how results are maintained over time.

title: Why natural does not always mean invisible
summary: Natural results are subtle, but still noticeable in photos and motion.
body: Natural is about balance, not perfection. The goal is refreshed, not transformed.
